30 | They/them
Just your local anxiety filled ghost boi. I'm a huge music fan and try to listen to as much as I can. I'm a HxC and metal fan through and through but can occasionally be found listening to hyper pop, indie, rap, etc.

If I'm not listening to music, I'm reading. Big fan of sci-fi and fantasy but if it's manga you can catch me reading anything.
